title: Signal Journey Schema
description: Schema for documenting signal processing pipelines with detailed provenance tracking. Files should follow the naming convention: sub-<participant>_task-<taskname>_signalJourney.json and use UTF-8 encoding. Uses namespaces (e.g., 'eeg:', 'nemar:') within the 'extensions' property for domain-specific fields.

sj_version.description: Version of the signalJourney specification being followed (Semantic Versioning MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH)

schema_version.description: Version of this schema file (Semantic Versioning MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH)

description.description: A brief human-readable description of the processing pipeline documented in this file.

versionHistory.description: Tracks changes made to this schema file over time.

version.description: The schema version for this entry.

date.description: The release date of this schema version.

changes.description: A summary of changes introduced in this version.

pipelineInfo.description: Placeholder for general pipeline information (e.g., project name, dataset details). To be defined in subtask X.

processingSteps.description: An ordered list of processing steps performed. Defined in #/definitions/processingStep

summaryMetrics.description: Optional section for summary statistics or overall quality metrics. To be defined in subtask 4.

extensions.description: Container for domain-specific extensions using namespaces. Add custom fields under the appropriate namespace (e.g., extensions.eeg.channelNoise).

nemar.description: Namespace for NEMAR-specific properties (e.g., pipeline IDs).

processingStep.description: Defines a single step in the processing pipeline.

stepId.description: Unique identifier for this step within the pipeline (e.g., 'step-1', 'ica-run').

name.description: Short, human-readable name for the step (e.g., 'High-pass Filter', 'ICA Decomposition').

description.description: Detailed description of the step's purpose and actions.

software.description: Details of the software used to perform this step.

parameters.description: List of parameters used in this step.

inputSources.description: Identifies the input data sources for this step (e.g., previous stepId, file path).

outputTargets.description: Identifies the outputs generated by this step (e.g., derived file path, variable name).

dependsOn.description: List of stepIds that must be completed before this step can execute.

summaryMetrics.description: Placeholder definition for summary metrics. To be defined in subtask 4.

dataType.description: Optional JSON schema type hint for the value (e.g., 'number', 'string', 'boolean', 'array', 'object'). Aids validation.
